text: Burangulovo () is a rural locality (a selo) in Kidryachevsky Selsoviet, Davlekanovsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 309 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 55 km from Davlekanovo, 5 km from Kidryachevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Davlekanovsky District
title: Burangulovo, Davlekanovsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
